name: 王怡惠
objective:
本課程介紹研究方法，培養學生撰寫論文的基本知識與能力。
This course will introduce research methods and provide students with fundamental knowledge and competence on writing thesis.
schedule:
Part 1	       Instructed by Prof. Hsiu-Hui Yang	
WK 1    9/ 9	Course Introduction & Developing Research Awareness
WK 2    9/16	Exploring Research Interests & Problem Awareness
WK 3    9/23	From Research Purpose & Questions to Topic Mapping
WK 4    9/30	Focusing Research Questions & Topic Development
WK 5   10/ 7	Workshop: Database & Keyword Searching
WK 6   10/14	Individual Topic Presentations

Part 2	Instructed by Assoc. Prof. Hsin-Yi Wu	
WK 7   10/21	How to structure literature review? (I) The depth of your research; Identifying what is good and latest reviewed papers.
WK 8   10/28	How to structure literature review? (II) Identifies opposing view.
WK 9   11/ 4	Indexing; Direct quotation, paraphrasing and referencing.
WK 10  11/11	References; How to avoid plagiarism; Something about AI.
WK 11  11/18	A few writing skill tips for humanities essays; link for future study.
WK 12  11/25	The latest trend in Moving-images studies.

Part 3	      Instructed by Prof. Yi-Hui Wang	
WK 13  12/ 2	Qualitative Research Methods: Ideation – Boundaries of Craft
WK 14  12/ 9	Qualitative Research Methods: Practice – Research and Discourse on Contemporary Ceramics Competitions
WK 15  12/16	Qualitative Research Methods: Thematic Exhibition Visit
WK 16  12/23	Qualitative Research Methods: Arts Practice as a Research Method
WK 17  12/30	Qualitative Research Methods: Interpretation – Craft and Place Making
WK 18   1/ 6	Qualitative Research Methods: Research Presentation
scorePolicy:
Scores:
Part 1 (35 %)	Participation & Discussion 20%; Assignments 30%; Individual Topic Presentation 50%.
Part 2 (30 %)	Strong participation 30%; Complete a well-structured literature review and references 70%. 
Part 3 (35%)	Participation & Discussion 20%; Assignments 30%; Individual Topic Presentation 50%.
materials: Art Practice As Research: Inquiry In The Visual Arts, Sullivan, Graeme, Sage Publications, Inc. 2004
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG4：優質教育（Quality Education）SDG11：永續城市與社區（Sustainable Cities and Communities）
課程是否導入AI: AI2：鼓勵學生使用生成式 AI 工具（Encourage students to use generative AI tools）
